attributes.action: Investigate Highways England in relation to proposed junction changes M25/A3 J10
attributes.additional_details:
http://roads.highways.gov.uk/projects/m25-junction-10-to-a3-wisley-interchange/

Highways England have not consulted with the Major of London. Proposal, if approved will increase traffic into London. This is in complete conflict with the Mayors vision and strategy for London in relation to traffic volume and pollution
attributes.background: Highways England propose to make major changes to junction 10/A3 interchange. They are currently putting forward plans which will mean significant areas of currently common land and woodland will be lost to the bulldozer for ever. The changes result in an improvement to traffic of under 10 minutes.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
